nodes.text: Athallia was an astronomical object located in the Athallia system. It was a part of the Athallia sector, within the Trailing Sectors portion of the Expansion Region. Kalarcha served as Athallia's capital. Athallia shared its name with the courier starship Athallian Messenger.

The Human male Fin Mak'lath hailed from Athallia, and served as a police officer in Kalarcha. When Mak'lath's wife was killed in food riots at some point by 3 ABY, the widowed policeman moved to the Outer Rim Territories planet Bespin, where he eventually became a member of the Bespin Wing Guard security force.

Athallia was first mentioned in the "Rogues Gallery" department within the one-hundred-forty-eighth issue of the Star Wars Insider magazine, which was released on March 11, 2014. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Athallia system, and therefore the celestial body Athallia, within grid square M-15.
